title: Distance Teaching and Mobile Learning online Curriculum consists of e-lessons targeted to teach students computer literacy, English, typing and other skills.

games.instruction: In the top left of your screen you will see the word of a body part. Using the main diagram, click on the circle that matches this body part.
games.title: Body Parts
games.description: In this game, you will be provided with a word that describes a part of the body. Using an illustration of a face or body, your job is to identify the part of the body that matches this word. We’ll keep score of how many you get right and how many you get wrong.

games.instruction: The game has three levels. On the first level, match the images of the products to your shopping list. Be careful! Each wrong answer will lower your score. On the second level drag and drop utensils to match their names. Finally, on the last level drag and drop prepared food to your customers.  Good luck !
games.title: Kitchen Master
games.description: Learn names of Fruits and Vegetables through pictures, discover names of  kitchen utensils and help feed the guests in your restaurant.

games.instruction: You have 60 seconds to match as many emotions as possible. You will see three words on your screen, which describe an emotion. Click on the word and drag it to the face that best matches the word.
games.title: How do you feel?
games.description: This game will help you improve your vocabulary about emotions. You have 60 seconds to match a word with a picture of the feeling that it represents. This game may make you feel anxious, happy, and excited…all while learning about these words as well!

games.instruction: Go from room to room to find object with name appears on the screen: Bagpack, Eraiser, Compass, Clock, Flask, MicroScope, Petri Dish, Flask Stand and many, many more. Click start to find them all.
games.title: Your classroom
games.description: Learn how to say and write common items found in the classroom in English.

games.instruction: Watch as animals appear on your screen. Once they have appeared, select the correct answer from the top right about how many animals there are.
games.title: Learn to count in English from 1 to 10
games.description: This game will teach you how to count from one to ten in English. You’ll go on a safari, where you will see all sorts of different animals. Your job is to count how many animals are on the screen.

games.instruction: You will see the name of a color appear on your screen, as a bubble of this color rises through the air. Click on the bubble to pop it before it reaches the top of the screen. For each bubble you pop, the rainbow will fill with that color. See how quickly you can complete the rainbow!
games.title: Rainbow Colors
games.description: This game will help you learn all the different colors of the rainbow. You’ll learn to recognize the name and pronunciation of each color in English: red, orange, yellow, green, blue, indigo and violet. You’ll need to identify the correct color and slowly build out all of the colors of the rainbow.

leaderboard.UserName: Margaret jaimes , Bolivarian Republic of Venezuela

games.instruction: Your goal is to help the monkey find all the letters of the English alphabet. Use your keyboard to explore the jungle: A goes left, D goes right, and W jumps. In the bottom left of your screen, you’ll see the letter you need to find next. On the bottom right of your screen, you’ll see a compass that will point you in the direction of your next letter. Watch out for the water though – you only have three lives, and you need to keep the monkey safe and out of the water.
games.title: Learning English Alphabet
games.description: Learn all of the letters of the English alphabet in this adventure game. You’ll need to guide a monkey through the jungle on his search to find all of the letters of the alphabet. Watch out though – the monkey can’t swim, so you’ll need to avoid water along the way!

games.instruction: This game has three parts. First, you’ll need to match the shape of each continent to the correct location on a map. Second, you’ll need to correctly label the name of each continent. Finally, you’ll need to correctly label the name of each ocean.
games.title: Continents and Oceans
games.description: Improve your geography vocabulary in this matching game. You’ll need to identify the location of each continent, as well as label each part of the world. Lastly, you’ll need to label all the oceans of the world. Feel like you’re traveling the world while you improve your English!

games.instruction: At the top of the screen, you will see boxes and numbers. If you click on the box, it will show you an animal. The number shows how many items belong to this animal. Your goal is to match the items on the baggage carousel to the correct animal. When an item appears on the baggage carousel, click on the item and drag it to the box of the animal to which it belongs. Match all of the items correctly to win.
games.title: Pets
games.description: This game will help improve your vocabulary with pets and household items. As items appear on a baggage carousel, your goal is to match them with the animal to which they belong. You’ll have to think fast – the baggage carousel moves quickly!

games.instruction: A year is divided into 12 months in the modern-day Gregorian calendar. All months have 30 or 31 days, except for February which has 28 days (29 in a leap year). Listen carefully when rotate stones to select correct date.
games.title: Months And Days Of The Year
games.description: Unearth Sinister Secrets in an Ancient Egyptian Tomb while learning days of the week and months in English.

games.instruction: This game has four levels. Your goal in each level is to stay alive for one minute. In the first level, your spaceship will be attached by falling asteroids. If an asteroid is falling towards you, you will need to type a letter on your keyboard to move your spaceship to that letter. In the second level, you will need to type the word written on an asteroid to blow it up before it hits you. In the third level, you’ll need to type the word written on a platform to help an astronaut jump to the next level. In the final level, you’ll need to type the word on the screen in order to avoid sinking into deathly quicksand. This is a race against the clock – can you survive each level for one minute?
games.title: Space Typing Adventure
games.description: See how long you can survive! In this game, you will dodge falling asteroids, shoot down comets, lead an astronaut through space, avoid deathly quicksand… all by using your keyboard! In each level, you’ll need to use your keyboard as quickly as possible to survive. This game will help you improve your typing by becoming more familiar with your keyboard.

games.instruction: Choose your native language to start the game. Type translation of the word in your native language to cast a spell.
games.title: Words battle
games.description: Engage in magical combat with evil troll. Cast spells by translating words from English into your native language. At the beginning of the game select your language by choosing corresponding flag. See English word on the screen then type word translation to cast a spell.

games.title: Memory 48
games.description: In this game you have to match the words with the pictures. Easy! Try to complete the game as fast as you can for maximum score.

games.instruction: Run as far as you can while avoiding obstacles
games.title: Action Verbs
games.description: An action verb is a verb that expresses physical or mental action. See how far can you run  by using most common action verbs.

games.instruction: Click on the tiles to rotate them, and connect computers into network
games.title: What is the Internet?
games.description: Internet is a global computer network providing a variety of information and communication facilities. Play this game to learn about internet.

games.instruction: Once the game has started, the first sequence introduces the user to the different parts of a computer by allowing the user to click on each object to see and hear its name. Once the user feels confident about each computer part, they can click “Test me!” which will take them to the next sequence in the game. In the next sequence, the user must correctly enter the name of each computer part to make that computer part disappear from the screen. If the user feels unsure about the name or spelling for any of the computer parts, they may return to the previous sequence to review their knowledge. The user completes the game when they can successfully type each of the names of the computer parts.
games.title: Computer Parts in Outer Space
games.description: Learn the common parts of a computer with the help of robots in outer space. (The game was created by the students from Bellevue High School Computer club)

games.instruction: Choose your native language to start the game by clicking on the flag. Select correct translation of the word in your native language by clicking on the word.
games.title: Magic Words
games.description: Test you vocabulary by guessing words under magician's hat.

games.instruction: Find all the given words on the grid. Drag over the letters of a found word.
games.title: Wild West Words
games.description: Word search puzzle game.

leaderboard.UserName: Ashlyn ferreira, Bolivarian Republic of Venezuela

games.instruction: Click on the words to assemble them into sentences. Try to score maximum points while ordering food at the restaurant.
games.title: At the restaurant
games.description: Learn what to ask at a Restaurant as a guest and as a waiter

games.instruction: Have a conversation with bot on any topic or type "learn English" for practice lessons. Please note, some lessons require microphone and a modern browser.
games.title: Chat with Prof. Edwords
games.description: Practice English with a friendly bot Professor Edwords.

games.instruction: Use keyboard arrows to navigate around the screen and collect pumpkins. Type letters in the box on the screen and click submit to guess the word.
games.title: Halloween Run
games.description: Learn and practice new English words! In the guessing game, try to guess a word shown on the screen. Reveal letters by collecting pumpkins. Try to guess the word before bats catch you.

games.instruction: To start select a flag which represent your native language. Drag-and-drop present from Santa's slate into the right house. If you see arrows, you can drag screen play area to reveal more houses. Try to complete all 10 levels.
games.title: Christmas Suprise
games.description: Help Santa to deliver presents to the right houses. Be careful you make three mistakes and the game is over.

games.instruction: Click on the words to assemble them into sentences. Try to score maximum points while making a purchase at the store.
games.title: At the store
games.description: Learn what to ask at a store to make a purchase

registerSchoolText: Are you a teacher or instructor? Register your organization to leverage reporting and customization capabilities, monitor progress of your students, and more!
siderailLoginText: Login to use the full power of our platform, earn badges, and make games adapt to your learning style.
